participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves to express herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games. My favorite band is One Direction. When I retire I want to open a bakery. I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing. I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, enjoys nature and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of being judged for my diet. My dad works in the automotive industry. I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors. I do not like wearing pants when I do not have to. On weekends I like to go hiking.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing pretty good too. I'm excited for the weekend, I'm going to Comic Con!
Oh my gosh, I'm so jealous! I love Comic Con! I've been wanting to go for years but I've never been able to make it.
You should totally go next year! It's so much fun, and there's so much to see and do.
I definitely will! I'm so excited to see all the costumes and meet my favorite characters.
Me too! I'm also looking forward to the panels and the vendors.
I'm not really familiar with the panels, what are they?
Oh, they're like Q&A sessions with the creators of your favorite shows and movies. It's a really great way to learn more about the things you love.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to have to check those out.
You should! I know you'll love them.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm so excited for Comic Con now!
Me too! It's going to be a blast!
I hope we run into each other there!
Me too! We can totally cosplay together!
That would be awesome! I'm so excited
